bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of the tongue assuming a black color. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 11: 治陰毒傷寒，面青，張 口出氣，心下硬，身不熱，只額上有汗，煩渴不止，舌黑多睡 , “To cure yin-poison with harm caused by cold. [Patients have] a greenish face. Their mouth is wide open and releases qi. There is a hardening below the heart. The body is not hot. Only on the forehead is there sweat, with unending vexation and thirst. They have a black tongue and they sleep a lot”.
